title: Making 5 Man OCE Team for 2016 - Silver +
body:
Looking for Experienced players to join a 5 man Ranked team. Please attach all relevant information below not looking for the best players in the world, but want serious players to progress through season 6. 

Silver + preferred

replies.body: Platinum 2 jungle main. Just looking for some ranked 5's experience. {{champion:154}}

hey, a lot of the players who have applied already are a lot better then me but I am very dedicated to getting better at league of legends currently am silver 4 and slowly making my way down the ranks! would really like to try out for your team, not the most mechanically skilled player or best decision maker but am very serious about doing well and trying to win! Online most weeknights and weekends also not a toxic player! 
would love too have a spot on your team as starter or a sub :)

Heyas,

Willing to try out see if we match.

My info :
Ingame Name : Katalize

Current Rank: G3
Highest Rank Achieved: G1

Top 5 Mid Champs:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am.
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players.

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.

I'm willing to give this a go, currently silver 3, have been in silver for 3 seasons (I just don't play ranked) I used to play in a ranked team that got to silver 1 after a week of being made...

Support main, but can play Marksman and Mid. I can't play too often due to other people using the internet for netflix, but I'll play when I can...

I am also going to make it a commitment to get a high rank this season (higher than I already am) if I'm not playing ranked 5's I'll be playing solo queue.

Send me a friend request.
IGN: DV Silent Resent

Hallo, friendly player currently stuck in Silver 2 since season 4. Very active and have skype. Top main but can fill any other role except ADC. 

(P.S.) Small experience with Ranked 5's but extensive experience in 4/5's normals.
Hey mate, Gold 5. Main ADC, Can play other roles fairly decent! Im English, 23 and have a small pecker. Cheers
Im atop, jg,support main and currently at gold 5.  Add me

hit me up. Support main. Was gold but now sil 1. Very serious and dedicated player ! 

add FrostLife ShaS
hit me up. jungle main. gold 4

I'm down, bronze 3 in solo Q (Gold 3 in ranked 5s)
I main support and can play just about all supps. Extensive knowledge of 5s.
Add me if you want. Prepared to be committed.
Kind regards
-Traloop
